item.description:
Hey everyone! Lets beat the heat & rain drops Sunday August 19th! Bring your favorite pals from 1:00pm-3:00pm for a romp and chance to socialize with best friends. Friendly dogs can jump in the splashy pool or play chase and wrestle around in our all indoor air conditioned play room or totally fenced in outdoor play yard weather permitting!


Proof of Current Vaccines Required: Rabies, DHLPP, Bordatella

Can't wait to see you all there!! Woof!
item.name: Sizzling Summer Slip Away...
